File history

Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current15:48, 19 March 2022900 × 600 (295 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 05:55, 31 October 2021 (UTC). De facto standard width for flags on Wikimedia is 600px. Also the sides of star on Camaleaun's version of the flag were not all the same length.
14:42, 19 March 20221,500 × 1,000 (313 bytes)Camaleaun (talk | contribs)Normalize size and viewbox
05:55, 31 October 2021900 × 600 (295 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)changed nominal dimensions to 900 × 600
17:27, 21 September 20201,500 × 1,000 (300 bytes)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Simplified construction for the star and others elements (white and blue sides). Fixed geometry. Optimized svg code with code cleanup and reduction. No other changes.
01:56, 2 August 20201,500 × 1,000 (522 bytes)Echando una mano (talk | contribs)Size
01:46, 2 August 20201,500 × 1,000 (3 KB)Echando una mano (talk | contribs)Star was not completely centered
